description: Series of experiments involving data collection, analysis, and report writing. Reports are submitted weekly or bi-weekly with formative feedback during labs and summative feedback on submissions. Requires 80% attendance and pre-lab documentation.

2-hour written exam during formal examination period with short and long written response questions covering lecture content and laboratory experiments. Hurdle requirement: 35% minimum marks needed to pass.
Three equally weighted assignments involving short answer questions and a research-based longer question requiring literature evaluation. Includes rubric-based assessment with written feedback.
